abstracts.cdata!:
The Poverty Reduction Support Operation
            (PRSO) Project for Georgia, the first in a series of three
            proposed PRSOs, is intended to support the Government of
            Georgia with the implementation o f reforms and policy
            priorities of Economic Development and Poverty Reduction
            Program (EDPRP, or the PRSP as it i s known in Georgia). The
            PRSO will support the objectives and the policies of the
            EDPRP by: a) strengthening public sector accountability,
            efficiency, and transparency; b) improving electricity and
            gas sector services; c) improving the environment for
            private sector development; and d) improving social
            protection, education and health care services. The success
            of this policy operation in Georgia depends basically on two
            main factors. First, the operation needs to well defined and
            focused on priority issues where the medium term strategy is
            well understood and accepted by the government. Second, any
            reform program must be grounded in a realistic assessment of
            the government's implementation capacity.
